00022 #ifndef UTAP_EXPRESSIONBUILDER_HH
00023 #define UTAP_EXPRESSIONBUILDER_HH
00024 
00025 #include "abstractbuilder.h"
00026 #include "utap.h"
00027 
00028 namespace UTAP
00029 {
00030     class ExpressionBuilder : public AbstractBuilder 
00031     {
00032     public:
00033         class ExpressionFragments 
00034         {
00035         private:
00036             std::vector<expression_t> data;
00037         public:
00038             expression_t &operator[] (int idx)
00039                 { return data[data.size() - idx - 1]; }
00040             void push(expression_t e)
00041                 { data.push_back(e); }
00042             void pop()
00043                 { data.pop_back(); }
00044             void pop(int n);
00045             uint32_t size() { return data.size(); }
00046         };
00047 
00048     protected:
00049         /* Expression stack */
00050         ExpressionFragments fragments;
00051 
00052         /* Pointer to the intermediate system under construction */
00053         TimedAutomataSystem *system;
00054 
00055         /* Current frame */
00056         frame_t frame;
00057 
00058         /* list of number of expected arguments */
00059         std::list<uint32_t> expectedArguments;
00060 
00061         /* Set the current frame */
00062         void setFrame(frame_t);
00063 
00064         expression_t makeConstant(int value);
00065 
00067         // allowProcessReferences()
00069         // If this method returns true, it is allowed to access the 
00070         // private identifiers of a process by prefixing the identifier
00071         // with the process name. 
00072         //
00073         // This is only interesting when parsing properties. In this case
00074         // the method should be overridden by a sub class.
00075         virtual bool allowProcessReferences() { return false; }
00076 
00077     public:
00078         ExpressionBuilder(TimedAutomataSystem *);
00079         ExpressionFragments &getExpressions();
00080 
00081         /************************************************************
00082          * Query functions
00083          */
00084         virtual bool isType(const char*);
00085         virtual bool isLocation(const char*);
00086 
00087         /************************************************************
00088          * Expressions
00089          */
00090         virtual void exprTrue();
00091         virtual void exprFalse();
00092         virtual void exprId(const char * varName);
00093         virtual void exprNat(int32_t); // natural number
00094         virtual void exprCallBegin(const char * functionName);
00095         virtual void exprCallEnd(uint32_t n); // n exprs as arguments
00096         virtual void exprArg(uint32_t n); // 1 exprs as n-th argument for fn-call
00097         virtual void exprArray(); // 2 expr 
00098         virtual void exprPostIncrement(); // 1 expr
00099         virtual void exprPreIncrement(); // 1 expr
00100         virtual void exprPostDecrement(); // 1 expr
00101         virtual void exprPreDecrement(); // 1 expr
00102         virtual void exprAssignment(Constants::kind_t op); // 2 expr
00103         virtual void exprUnary(Constants::kind_t unaryop); // 1 expr
00104         virtual void exprBinary(Constants::kind_t binaryop); // 2 expr
00105         virtual void exprInlineIf(); // 3 expr
00106         virtual void exprComma(); // 2 expr
00107         virtual void exprDot(const char *); // 1 expr
00108         virtual void exprDeadlock();
00109 
00110     };
00111 }
00112 
00113 #endif
